# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us, reflecting its unique features, durability, and the expertise behind its creation. Considering its unparalleled value, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or needs. We kindly invite you to seize this opportunity to experience the excellence firsthand. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction and exceptional customer service to ensure your satisfaction. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
